articles.title: AI Conquers Quantum Computing, OpenAI Launches GPT-5
articles.description: Researchers in China have achieved a quantum computing milestone by using AI to precisely arrange over 2,000 neutral atom qubits, a significant leap for scaling quantum processors. Concurrently, OpenAI launched its latest model, GPT-5, touted as a major upgrade and a step towards artificial general intelligence, despite some initial user feedback regarding its tone. [2, 4]

articles.title: PM Modi Inaugurates Key Highway Projects, NDA Names Vice-Presidential Candidate
articles.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi inaugurated two major National Highway projects in Delhi, valued at nearly â‚¹11,000 crore, including sections of the Dwarka Expressway and Urban Extension Road-II, aimed at reducing traffic congestion. Simultaneously, Maharashtra Governor C.P. Radhakrishnan was announced as the National Democratic Alliance's Vice-Presidential candidate. [1, 3, 5, 7]

articles.title: Trump Envoy States Putin Agreed to Ukraine Security Protections at Summit
articles.description: Special U.S. envoy Steve Witkoff reported that Russian leader Vladimir Putin agreed during his summit with President Donald Trump to allow the U.S. and European allies to offer Ukraine a security guarantee, similar to NATO's collective defense mandate, as part of a potential resolution to the three-and-a-half-year conflict. [5, 8]
